EmailTemplate.description: The agency has closed the service request because the agency was unable to complete the request
EmailTemplate.name: SR HTML Closed Unable to Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 311 Request was unable to be completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear resident,
Your request for {!Case.Subject} at {!Case.Address__c} has been closed by {!Case.Servicing_Agency_Expanded__c}. The agency was unable to complete your request because of the following:
<<Agency Comments>> This will be a drop down box, with room for individual comments. *
If you would like to resubmit this request or to check any notes on your request, please go to 311.dc.gov or call 311 and reference service request number {!Case.CaseNumber}. An agent will be happy to answer your questions, concerns or connect you with the correct department.
Thanks again for contacting the Mayor’s 311 Hotline.
*Agency comments can include:
· Insufficient address information
· Bulk pickup materials weren’t outside
· Area inspected and no problem was found
